thread.title: Man gets 5 years in jail for muzzling dog with electrical tape | New York Post
thread.title_full: Man gets 5 years in jail for muzzling dog with electrical tape | New York Post

author: Joe Tacopino
title: Man gets 5 years in jail for muzzling dog with electrical tape | New York Post
text:
A North Carolina man was given the maximum penalty of five years in jail Friday for the heartless crime of wrapping his dog’s mouth tightly shut with electrical tape.
William Leonard Dobson, 42, was handed the severe sentence after pleading guilty to a felony charge of ill-treatment of an animal for the 2015 muzzling, according to WSPA-TV. 
“I’m not trying to be mean,” Circuit Judge Markley Dennis told dog owner, “but I wish I could give you more.”
Caitlyn, a female staffie-mix, had her jaw wound so tightly that its tongue turned black. Images of the pooch went viral on social media.
“I think this sends a message that … we’re not going to let this stuff slide anymore,” an advocate for the Caitlyn told Charleston’s Post and Courier newspaper.
